short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension copies the shruggie character to your clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copy and paste Shruggie app
Copies the Shruggie characters to your clipboard to paste anywhere.
¯\_(ツ)_/¯
That's it!
No background pages or anything
